Title: Relates to reimbursement by Medicaid for services required by state law
Summary: Relates to reimbursement for Medicaid for services required by state law; provides department of health must pay 100% of the non-federal share for services required by state law, not federal.
LawCode: Amd ยง368-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to reimbursement for medicaid services required by state law
